bug.author: octavian-ganea
bug.description: I tried the Scala example shown in the linear regression page: <denchmark-link:http://pastebin.com/3uyKyCPU>http://pastebin.com/3uyKyCPU</denchmark-link> . The ScoreIterationListener seem not to work , nothing being printed, but no error is shown. Probably is a problem with Scala since also the HistogramIterationListener has also a problem in Scala.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
